# Phage PCR {.unnumbered}

**Strains:** Clonal Phage lysate

**Reagents:** 

**Time required:**  


1. Dilute high-concentration phage lysate 1:10 in Nuclease Free Water (to dilute out any salts etc), incubate at 98C for 30 minutes.

2. Use 1uL of this lysate for setting up PCR.
